title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: When adding a new localization key, if the key field is left blank, the externalized text associated with the key cannot be displayed in the chart. This issue can be reproduced by following the steps below.
OB: The externalized text associated with the blank key is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: In the properties file, leaving the key field blank should still allow the valid value to be externalized and displayed in the chart title.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the localization settings.
2. Add a new localization key.
3. Leave the key field blank.
4. Verify that the externalized text associated with the key is not displayed in the chart title.
